title: The 40/40 Club New Years Eve Bash - 2016
desc: Come out and celebrate New Year?s Eve 2016 at the hottest spot in New York City, The 40/40 Club! Ring in the New Year while enjoying custom cocktails,tasty treats and watching the ball drop on our 165 inch state of the art video display walls!  New Year's Eve at The 40/40 Club is an event you do not want to miss! We hope to see you there! ? **Credit card holder must be present the night of the event with a valid state ID and the purchasing credit card. If card holder or credit card is NOT present, another form of payment will be required on event night or The 40/40 Club will not be responsible for the requested services purchased.?? NO REFUNDS / NO EXCEPTIONS.
